title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 60-4.6 - Payments to insured
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 §§ 60-4.6 - Payments to insured

State Regulations

For the purpose of complying with the provisions of Insurance Law section 3420(f)(1), no group policy subject to this Part shall be issued by any insurer unless it contains coverage providing for payments to the insured, as defined in such coverage, by the New York Motor Vehicle Accident Indemnification Corporation, pursuant to the provisions of Insurance Law article 52 applicable to such payments. Notes

York State Register February 8, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 06, eff. 2/8/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
